mapper.select: select u.order_record_id as orderRecordId, u.order_id as orderId, u.sender as sender, u.sender_name as senderName, u.content as content, u.file_url as fileUrl, u.req_time as reqTime, u.creat_time as creatTime, u.isdel as isdel from tm_order_record u where u.isdel = 0 and u.order_id = #{orderId} order by u.creat_time desc limit #{start},#{length}

select u.order_record_id as orderRecordId, u.sender_name as senderName, u.content as content, u.file_url as fileUrl, u.req_time as reqTime, u.creat_time as creatTime, u.isdel as isdel from tm_order_record u left join tm_order v on u.order_id = v.order_id where u.isdel = 0 and v.case_id = #{caseId} order by u.creat_time desc limit #{start},#{length}
select count(u.order_record_id) from tm_order_record u where u.isdel = 0

select count(u.order_record_id) from tm_order_record u right join tm_order v on v.order_id = u.order_id and v.case_id = #{id} where u.isdel = 0 and u.order_record_id != (select order_record_id from tm_order_record where order_id = u.order_id limit 1)

select count(u.order_record_id) from tm_order_record u where u.isdel = 0 and u.order_record_id != (select order_record_id from tm_order_record where order_id = u.order_id limit 1) and u.order_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tm_orderrecord( orderrecord_name, country, language, creat_time, isdel )values( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.update: update tm_orderrecord set orderrecord_name=#{name}, country=#{country}, language=#{language}, update_time=NOW() where orderrecord_id=#{orderRecordId}
mapper.select: select u.orderrecord_id as orderRecordId, u.orderrecord_name as name, u.country as country, u.language as language, u.isdel as isdel from tm_orderrecord u where u.orderrecord_id = #{orderRecordId}
select u.para_domain, u.para_value as id, u.chinese as text, u.isdisplay, u.isdel from tm_parameter u where u.isdisplay = 1 and u.isdel = 0 and u.para_domain = #{domain}
mapper.update: update tm_orderrecord set isdel=1 where orderrecord_id = #{orderRecordId}
